# Results Components


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## transcription_results

Displays completed transcription results with transcript text, metadata,
and action buttons.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_workflow_transcription_single_file/components/results.py#L27"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### transcription_results

``` python

def transcription_results(
    job_id:str, # Unique identifier for the transcription job
    transcription_text:str, # The transcribed text
    metadata:Dict, # Transcription metadata from the plugin
    file_info:Dict, # Dictionary with file details (name, path, type, size_str)
    plugin_info:Dict, # Dictionary with plugin details (id, title, supports_streaming)
    config:SingleFileWorkflowConfig, # Workflow configuration
    router:APIRouter, # Workflow router for generating route URLs
    stepflow_router:APIRouter, # StepFlow router for generating stepflow URLs
)->FT: # FastHTML component showing results with export options

```

*Render transcription results with export options.*

## transcription_error

Displays transcription error state with error message and retry option.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_workflow_transcription_single_file/components/results.py#L139"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### transcription_error

``` python

def transcription_error(
    error_message:str, # Description of the error that occurred
    file_info:Optional, # Optional dictionary with file details
    config:SingleFileWorkflowConfig, # Workflow configuration
    stepflow_router:APIRouter, # StepFlow router for generating stepflow URLs
)->FT: # FastHTML component showing error with retry option

```

*Render transcription error message.*
